summary: Frontend implements the requested internal registration/login behavior changes (registerInternalUser hook, superadmin-claimed check via isSuperadminClaimed, and registration error mapping), but the diff summary also includes multiple unrelated frontend changes and new non-internal routes/pages that violate the stated scope constraints. Backend requirement implementation cannot be verified from the provided truncated backend diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified multiple public (non-internal) pages and UI features (LandingPage, public Register/Login pages, translated landing header/footer, etc.), which are explicitly out of scope per BuildRequest constraints (scope limited strictly to /internal/daftar, /internal/login, internal approval UI, and related backend methods).
hallucinated_features.reason: Diff summary shows substantial edits to public-facing pages and shared components unrelated to the internal-only patch request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new /customer-service route (non-internal) in the main router.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest forbids adding new routes outside internal; diff summary explicitly mentions a new /customer-service route in App.tsx.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/used backend role-name validation endpoint from the frontend (useValidateRoleName calling actor.isValidRoleName) and corresponding UI behavior on InternalLoginPage.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding or using an isValidRoleName backend method/hook as part of this patch.
